item.description:
rsvp to success@revolvethis.com

MOVIE PREMIERE: THE CALL THE ENTREPRENEUR (w/Distinguished CEO Panel Discussion}

Join the Exemplar Entrepreneurs for the Largest Event of the Year!

The Call of The Entrepreneur is a moving documentary about the spirit, courage, and perseverance of the entrepreneur that creates value in society! Join HUNDREDS of Entrepreneurs for this special event and discussion amongst CEOs moderated by Revolve, Inc!

MODERATOR: REVOLVE, INC

Kevin Krauss, Director, Revolve, Inc
Director - Entrepreneurship Department, Suffolk University


Distinguished CEO Panel:

David Hartstein, CEO, Kabloom

Diane Sutter, CEO, MyTV

Christopher Marston, CEO, Exemplar Companies, Inc

Ron Baker, founder, The VeraSage Institute

and MORE TO COME. . . stay tuned!

RSVP TO: Success@Revolvethis.com


SPONSORS:

Revolve, Inc: Accelerate The Revolution!

Emerson College, E3 Entrepreneurship Program

Exemplar Law Partners, "No Hourly Bull"
The Acton Institute (Creators of the Documentary}


VIP Reception Prior to the event: (Invitation Only}
item.name: Premiere!!: The Call of The Entrepreneur Documentary and CEO Panel Discussion!
